0.0.1.name: wordpress/krakatau
0.0.1.description: Krakatau theme is simple,  minimalist,  readable,  responsive layout and valid HTML5. Krakatau supports seven widgetized areas,  custom menu,  header image and background. The theme settings include options for featured post slider effect,  SEO optimized,  Image rotator,  ads rotator,  setup social network icons,  welcome message on home page,  blogazine style for unique post,  google meta verification code,  bing verification code,  add google plus code and much more. Krakatau is user friendly wordpress theme to keep your site elegant.
